pr_title: Add tests to verify loadbalancing with treafik lb for multiple domains

timeline.message: Adding utilities for creating Traefik load balancer
Log the assertion errors in IT*.out files
Deploy application using REST and access it through traefik LB
Remove the domain creation in PV

timeline.bodyText:
Add more information about the usecase
(a) we are verifying host routing usecase
(b) A single Traefik Ingress controller routing web requests to multiple domains by providing host information in Http Header.
(c) quick info about the expected return string from the webapp.
timeline.author: anpanigr

replies.bodyText: Added more details to test descriptions.
replies.author: sankarpn

timeline.bodyText: Modify test name to be specific testTraefikHostRoutingAcrossDomains()
timeline.author: anpanigr

timeline.bodyText: Does the clusterView Servlet assures that the response is coming form domain1/domain2. Does it display the unique managed server name from each domain ?
timeline.author: anpanigr

replies.bodyText: Yes, the domain names are bound in JNDI trees of the managed servers and later verified while accessing a particular managed server response.
replies.author: sankarpn

timeline.bodyText:
We need to add test
(a) to access console thru LoadBalancer
(b) access the app thru TLS enabled EndPoints.
timeline.author: anpanigr

replies.bodyText:
Why do you want to access the console through loadbalancer?
What is the usecase?
replies.author: sankarpn

replies.bodyText: added testcases for accessing the admin server console.
replies.author: sankarpn

timeline.message: Add verification checks to determine host routing is done correctly

timeline.bodyText: Assigns unique namespaces for operator, Traefik and domains
timeline.author: xiancao

timeline.bodyText: Can you let Kubernetes pick up the nodeport for Traefik then get the assigned nodeport through getServiceNodePort() method? In parallel run, the predefined nodeport may got port conflicts.
timeline.author: xiancao

timeline.bodyText: change this to: domainUid + "." + domainNamespace + ".cluster-1.test", K8S_NODEPORT_HOST, nodeportshttp);
timeline.author: xiancao

timeline.message: Add a delay before accessing the app

timeline.bodyText: You can change this to: domainUid + "." + domainNamespace + ".cluster-1.test", K8S_NODEPORT_HOST, nodeportshttp);
timeline.author: xiancao

timeline.bodyText: You can change this to: domainUid + "." + domainNamespace + ".cluster-1.test", K8S_NODEPORT_HOST, nodeportshttp);

timeline.bodyText: use 'Traefik' since it is a product name

diff --git a/new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/actions/TestActions.java b/new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/actions/TestActions.java
index f2143f56a5..2277fba2e6 100644
--- a/new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/actions/TestActions.java
+++ b/new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/actions/TestActions.java

@@ -341,7 +341,7 @@ public class TestActions {
   }
 
   /**
-   * Install traefik ingress controller.
+   * Install Traefik ingress controller.
    *
    * @param params the parameters to Helm install command, such as release name, namespace, repo url,
    *               repo name and chart name

timeline.author: xiancao

timeline.bodyText: change all 'traefik' in the comments to 'Traefik'
timeline.author: xiancao
xiancao
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -448,6 +455,63 @@ public static HelmParams installAndVerifyVoyager(String voyagerNamespace,
     return voyagerHelmParams;
   }
 
+  /**
+   * Install traefik and wait for up to five minutes for the traefik pod to be ready.
+   *
+   * @param traefikNamespace the namespace in which the traefik ingress controller is installed
+   * @param nodeportshttp the web nodeport of traefik
+   * @param nodeportshttps the websecure nodeport of traefik
+   * @return the traefik Helm installation parameters
+   */
+  public static HelmParams installAndVerifyTraefik(String traefikNamespace,
+      int nodeportshttp,
+      int nodeportshttps) {
+    LoggingFacade logger = getLogger();
+    // Helm install parameters
+    HelmParams traefikHelmParams = new HelmParams()
+        .releaseName(TRAEFIK_RELEASE_NAME + "-" + traefikNamespace.substring(3))
+        .namespace(traefikNamespace)
+        .repoUrl(TRAEFIK_REPO_URL)
+        .repoName(TRAEFIK_REPO_NAME)
+        .chartName(TRAEFIK_CHART_NAME);
+
+    // NGINX chart values to override

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/utils/CommonTestUtils.java b/new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/utils/CommonTestUtils.java
index 5fd55fae94..f78f5cebc3 100644
--- a/new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/utils/CommonTestUtils.java
+++ b/new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/utils/CommonTestUtils.java

@@ -456,12 +457,12 @@ public class CommonTestUtils {
   }
 
   /**
-   * Install traefik and wait for up to five minutes for the traefik pod to be ready.
+   * Install Traefik and wait for up to five minutes for the Traefik pod to be ready.
    *
-   * @param traefikNamespace the namespace in which the traefik ingress controller is installed
-   * @param nodeportshttp the web nodeport of traefik
-   * @param nodeportshttps the websecure nodeport of traefik
-   * @return the traefik Helm installation parameters
+   * @param traefikNamespace the namespace in which the Traefik ingress controller is installed
+   * @param nodeportshttp the web nodeport of Traefik
+   * @param nodeportshttps the websecure nodeport of Traefik
+   * @return the Traefik Helm installation parameters
    */
   public static HelmParams installAndVerifyTraefik(String traefikNamespace,
       int nodeportshttp,

timeline.bodyText: what if only nodeportshttp or nodeportshttps is not 0?
timeline.author: xiancao
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -448,6 +455,63 @@ public static HelmParams installAndVerifyVoyager(String voyagerNamespace,
     return voyagerHelmParams;
   }
 
+  /**
+   * Install traefik and wait for up to five minutes for the traefik pod to be ready.
+   *
+   * @param traefikNamespace the namespace in which the traefik ingress controller is installed
+   * @param nodeportshttp the web nodeport of traefik
+   * @param nodeportshttps the websecure nodeport of traefik
+   * @return the traefik Helm installation parameters
+   */
+  public static HelmParams installAndVerifyTraefik(String traefikNamespace,
+      int nodeportshttp,
+      int nodeportshttps) {
+    LoggingFacade logger = getLogger();
+    // Helm install parameters
+    HelmParams traefikHelmParams = new HelmParams()
+        .releaseName(TRAEFIK_RELEASE_NAME + "-" + traefikNamespace.substring(3))
+        .namespace(traefikNamespace)
+        .repoUrl(TRAEFIK_REPO_URL)
+        .repoName(TRAEFIK_REPO_NAME)
+        .chartName(TRAEFIK_CHART_NAME);
+
+    // NGINX chart values to override
+    TraefikParams traefikParams = new TraefikParams()
+        .helmParams(traefikHelmParams);
+
+    if (nodeportshttp != 0 && nodeportshttps != 0) {
+      traefikParams
+          .nodePortsHttp(nodeportshttp)
+          .nodePortsHttps(nodeportshttps);
+    }

replies.bodyText: I copied this code from the one I guess you created. Your question makes sense, removed the check and assign value only from supplied method params.
replies.author: sankarpn
